description.english: Win a Hardcore run.

description.english: Conjure 5 times in a single turn.

description.english: Win a run with a Weekly Hero.

description.english: Pet a Hellhound and live to tell the tale.

description.french: Voler 3 objets dans la même boutique.
description.polish: Ukradnij 3 przedmioty z tego samego sklepu.

description.english: Kill ALL enemies before the Battle Phase.
description.brazilian: Mate TODOS os inimigos antes da Fase de Batalha.
description.schinese: 在战斗阶段开始前消灭所有敌人。
description.turkish: Savaş Aşamasından önce TÜM düşmanları öldürün.
description.spanish: Mata a TODOS los enemigos antes de la Fase de Batalla.
description.tchinese: 在战斗阶段开始前消灭所有敌人。
description.french: Tuer TOUS les ennemis avant la Phase de combat.
description.polish: Zabij WSZYSTKICH wrogów przed Fazą Walki.
description.russian: Убейте ВСЕХ врагов до начала фазы боя.

description.english: Play 5 Slide cards in a single turn.
description.brazilian: Jogue 5 cartas Deslizar em um único turno.
description.schinese: 在单个回合中使用5张行进卡。
description.turkish: Tek turda 5 Kaygan kart ile oynayın.
description.spanish: Juega 5 cartas de Empuje en un solo turno.
description.tchinese: 在单个回合中使用5张行进卡。
description.french: Jouer 5 cartes Glissade en un seul tour.
description.polish: Zagraj 5 kart Ślizgu w jednej turze.
description.russian: Разыграйте 5 карт толчка за один ход.

description.english: Hit 10 enemies with a single attack.
description.brazilian: Atinja 10 inimigos com um único ataque.
description.schinese: 单次攻击击中10个敌人。
description.spanish: Impacta a 10 enemigos con un solo ataque.
description.tchinese: 单次攻击击中10个敌人。
description.french: Toucher 10 ennemis avec une seule attaque.

description.english: Have 5 of the same alliance in your Party.
description.brazilian: Tenha 5 da mesma aliança em sua Equipe.
description.schinese: 队伍中拥有5个相同联盟羁绊。
description.spanish: Logra tener 5 copias de la misma Alianza en tu Grupo.
description.tchinese: 队伍中拥有5个相同联盟羁绊。
description.french: Avoir 5 membres de la même alliance dans votre groupe.
description.polish: Miej w drużynie 5 jednostek tego samego sojuszu.
description.russian: Соберите в отряде 5 бойцов одного альянса.

description.english: Have a deck of only upgraded cards.
description.brazilian: Tenha um baralho apenas com cartas aprimoradas.
description.schinese: 卡组中全部卡牌都升级过。
description.turkish: Yalnızca güçlendirilmiş kartlardan oluşan bir desteye sahip olun.
description.spanish: Logra tener un mazo compuesto exclusivamente de cartas mejoradas.
description.tchinese: 卡组中全部卡牌都升级过。
description.french: Avoir un deck composé uniquement de cartes améliorées.
description.polish: Miej talię składającą się wyłącznie z ulepszonych kart.
description.russian: Соберите колоду только из улучшенных карт.

description.english: Have 10 different active alliances in your Party.
description.brazilian: Tenha 10 alianças ativas diferentes em sua Equipe.
description.schinese: 队伍中拥有10个不同有效联盟羁绊。
description.spanish: Logra tener 10 Alianzas activas distintas en tu Grupo.
description.tchinese: 队伍中拥有10个不同有效联盟羁绊。
description.french: Avoir 10 alliances actives différentes dans votre groupe.
description.polish: Miej 10 różnych aktywnych sojuszy w swojej drużynie.
description.russian: Соберите в отряде 10 разных активных альянсов.

description.english: Unlock all Cards on the Crypt.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as Cartas na Cripta.
description.schinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部卡牌。
description.turkish: Mezar Odası'ndaki tüm Kartların kilidini aç.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las Cartas en la Cripta.
description.tchinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部卡牌。
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les Cartes dans la Crypte.

description.english: Unlock all Alliances on the Crypt.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as Alianças na Cripta.
description.schinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部联盟羁绊。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las Alianzas en la Cripta.
description.tchinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部联盟羁绊。
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les Alliances dans la Crypte.

description.english: Unlock all Skills on the Crypt.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as Habilidades na Cripta.
description.schinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部技能。
description.turkish: Mezar Odası'ndaki tüm Becerilerin kilidini açın.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las Habilidades en la Cripta.
description.tchinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部技能。
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les Compétences dans la Crypte.

description.english: Unlock all Skins on the Crypt.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as Aparências na Cripta.
description.schinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部皮肤。
description.turkish: Mezar Odası'ndaki tüm kaplamaların kilidini açın.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los Skins en la Cripta.
description.tchinese: 在墓穴中解锁全部皮肤。
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les Apparences dans la Crypte.

description.english: Kill a Dragon Egg before it hatches.
description.brazilian: Destrua um Ovo de Dragão antes que ele choque.
description.schinese: 在一个龙蛋孵化前消灭它。
description.turkish: Bir Ejderha Yumurtasını yumurtadan çıkmadan önce öldürün.
description.spanish: Mata un Huevo de Dragón antes de que se abra.
description.tchinese: 在一个龙蛋孵化前消灭它。
description.french: Tuer un Œuf de Dragon avant qu'il n'éclose.
description.polish: Zabij Smocze Jajo, zanim się wykluje.
description.russian: Уничтожьте яйцо дракона до того, как оно вылупится.

description.english: Kill a baby... Dragon.
description.schinese: 消灭一只幼龙。
description.brazilian: Mate um bebê... Dragão.
description.spanish: Mata a un bebé... Dragón.
description.tchinese: 消灭一只幼龙。
description.french: Tuer un bébé... Dragon.

description.english: Win a run with 7 cards or less in your deck.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida com 7 cartas ou menos no seu baralho.
description.schinese: 卡组里卡牌数量少于7张卡牌时赢得一局游戏。
description.turkish: Destenizde 7 veya daha az kart bulunan bir mücadeleyi kazanın.
description.spanish: Gana una partida con 7 o menos cartas en tu mazo.
description.tchinese: 卡组里卡牌数量少于7张卡牌时赢得一局游戏。
description.french: Gagner une partie avec 7 cartes ou moins dans votre deck.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę, mając 7 lub mniej kart w talii.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, имея в колоде 7 или менее карт.

description.english: Skip a Boss relic reward.
description.brazilian: Pule uma recompensa de relíquia de Chefe.
description.schinese: 跳过一个首领遗物奖励。
description.spanish: Sáltate una recompensa de Reliquia de Jefe.
description.tchinese: 跳过一个首领遗物奖励。
description.french: Ignorer une récompense de relique de boss.
description.polish: Pomiń nagrodę w postaci reliktu za pokonanie Bossa.
description.russian: Откажитесь от награды-реликвии за победу над боссом.

description.english: Win a run without using Runes.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida sem usar Runas.
description.schinese: 不使用符文并获得一场游戏胜利。
description.spanish: Gana una partida sin usar ninguna Runa.
description.tchinese: 不使用符文并获得一场游戏胜利。
description.french: Gagner une partie sans utiliser de Runes.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, не используя руны.

description.english: Win a run without drafting at a Unit Banner.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida sem recrutar em um Estandarte de Unidade.
description.schinese: 不在旗帜处招募任何单位并获得一场游戏胜利。
description.turkish: Birim Flamasında taslak hazırlamadan bir mücadeleyi kazanın.
description.spanish: Gana una partida sin obtener unidades en ningún Estandarte.
description.tchinese: 不在旗帜处招募任何单位并获得一场游戏胜利。
description.french: Gagner une partie sans recruter à une Bannière D'unité.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę, nie dobierając jednostek przy Sztandarze.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, не нанимая бойцов у Знамени.

description.english: Play 20 cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 单个回合使用20张卡牌。
description.brazilian: Jogue 20 cartas em um único turno.
description.spanish: Juega 20 cartas en un solo turno.
description.tchinese: 单个回合使用20张卡牌。
description.french: Jouer 20 cartes en un seul tour.

description.english: Have 10000 Red Gems.
description.brazilian: Tenha 10000 Gemas Vermelhas.
description.schinese: 拥有10000枚红宝石。
description.spanish: Logra tener 10000 Gemas Rojas.
description.tchinese: 拥有10000枚红宝石。
description.french: Avoir 10000 Gemmes rouges.

description.english: Have 50000 Red Gems.
description.brazilian: Tenha 50000 Gemas Vermelhas.
description.schinese: 拥有50000枚红宝石。
description.spanish: Logra tener 50000 Gemas Rojas.
description.tchinese: 拥有50000枚红宝石。
description.french: Avoir 50000 Gemmes rouges.

description.english: Have 100000 Red Gems.
description.brazilian: Tenha 100000 Gemas Vermelhas.
description.schinese: 拥有100000枚红宝石。
description.spanish: Logra tener 100000 Gemas Rojass.
description.tchinese: 拥有100000枚红宝石。
description.french: Avoir 100000 Gemmes rouges.

description.english: Win a run without upgrading your Hero.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida sem aprimorar seu Herói.
description.schinese: 不升级英雄并赢得一局游戏。
description.spanish: Gana una partida sin mejorar a tu Héroe.
description.tchinese: 不升级英雄并赢得一局游戏。
description.french: Gagner une partie sans améliorer votre Héros.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, не улучшая своего героя.

description.english: Have 2 level 3 Draugrs.
description.brazilian: Tenha 2 Draugrs nível 3.
description.schinese: 拥有2个3级的尸鬼。
description.spanish: Logra tener 2 Draugrs de nivel 3.
description.tchinese: 拥有2个3级的尸鬼。
description.french: Avoir 2 Draugrs de niveau 3.

description.english: Play a Talent, a Spell, an Artifice, a Summon, and an Enchant card in a single turn.
description.brazilian: Jogue uma carta Talento, Feitiço, Artifício, Invocação, e Encanto num único turno.
description.schinese: 单个回合使用一张灵感牌，一张法术牌，一张技巧牌，一张召唤牌和一张赋能牌。
description.turkish: Tek turda bir Kabiliyet, bir Büyü, bir Sahte, bir Summon ve bir Büyüleme kartı oyna.
description.spanish: Juega una carta de Talento, otra de Hechizo, otra de Artificio, otra de Invocación, y otra de Encantamiento en un mismo turno.
description.tchinese: 单个回合使用一张灵感牌，一张法术牌，一张技巧牌，一张召唤牌和一张赋能牌。
description.french: Jouer une carte Talent, Sort, Artifice, Invocation et Enchantement en un seul tour.
description.polish: Zagraj kartę Talentu, Zaklęcia, Fortelu, Przywołania i Uroku w jednej turze.
description.russian: Разыграйте за один ход карты таланта, заклинания, механизма, призыва и чар.

description.english: Win a run with 35 cards or more in your deck.
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida com 35 cartas ou mais no seu baralho.
description.schinese: 卡组里卡牌数量多于35张时赢得一局游戏。
description.turkish: Destenizde 35 veya daha fazla kart bulunan bir mücadeleyi kazanın.
description.spanish: Gana una partida con 35 o más cartas en tu mazo.
description.tchinese: 卡组里卡牌数量多于35张时赢得一局游戏。
description.french: Gagner une partie avec 35 cartes ou plus dans votre deck.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę, mając 35 lub więcej kart w talii.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, имея в колоде 35 или более карт.

description.english: Collect all Wings with any Hero.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as Asas com qualquer Herói.
description.schinese: 任意英雄解锁全部羽翼。
description.turkish: Herhangi bir Kahramanın tüm Kanatlarını toplayın.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las Alas con un mismo Héroe.
description.tchinese: 任意英雄解锁全部羽翼。
description.french: Collecter toutes les Ailes avec n'importe quel Héros.
description.russian: Соберите все крылья за любого героя.

displayName.english: Party Rock In The House Tonight
displayName.turkish: Bu Gece Evde Rock Partisi Var
displayName.french: Party Rock In The House Tonight

description.english: Win a run with 9 or more units in your Party.
description.spanish: Gana una partida con 9 o más unidades en tu Grupo.
description.schinese: 队伍中拥有9个以上单位时赢得一局游戏。
description.turkish: Grubunuzda 9 ya da daha fazla birimin bulunduğu bir mücadeleyi kazanın..
description.brazilian: Vença uma partida com 9 ou mais unidades na sua Equipe.
description.tchinese: 队伍中拥有9个以上单位时赢得一局游戏。
description.french: Gagner une partie avec 9 unités ou plus dans votre groupe.
description.polish: Wygraj rozgrywkę, mając 9 lub więcej jednostek w drużynie.
description.russian: Победите в забеге, имея в отряде 9 или более бойцов.

description.english: Reach Mastery 10 with the Inquisitor.
description.brazilian: Alcance Maestria 10 com o Inquisidor.
description.schinese: 审判官达到精通10。
description.spanish: Alcanza Maestría 10 con el Inquisidor.
description.tchinese: 审判官达到精通10。
description.french: Atteindre la Maîtrise 10 avec l'Inquisiteur.

description.english: Reach Mastery 10 with Nightshade.
description.brazilian: Alcance Maestria 10 com a Sombra da Noite.
description.schinese: 夜影达到精通10。
description.spanish: Alcanza Maestría 10 con Belladona.
description.tchinese: 夜影达到精通10。
description.french: Atteindre la Maîtrise 10 avec Belladone.

description.english: Reach Mastery 10 with the Warlock.
description.brazilian: Alcance Maestria 10 com o Arcanista.
description.schinese: 巫师达到精通10。
description.spanish: Alcanza Maestría 10 con el Brujo.
description.tchinese: 巫师达到精通10。
description.french: Atteindre la Maîtrise 10 avec le Sorcier.

description.english: Sacrifice 5 units at the Sacrifice Pit.
description.schinese: 在祭祀坑献祭5个单位。
description.brazilian: Sacrifique 5 unidades no Fosso do Sacrifício.
description.spanish: Sacrifica 5 unidades en El Pozo Sacrificial.
description.tchinese: 在祭祀坑献祭5个单位。
description.french: Sacrifier 5 unités au Puits de sacrifice.
description.russian: Принесите в жертву 5 бойцов в Яме жертвоприношений.

description.english: Defeat Luciferos.
description.schinese: 击败路西法。
description.brazilian: Derrote Lúciferos.
description.spanish: Derrota a Luciferos.
description.tchinese: 击败路西法。
description.french: Vaincre Luciferos.

description.english: Defeat Fate.
description.schinese: 击败命运。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Destino.
description.spanish: Derrota a Destino.
description.tchinese: 击败命运。
description.french: Vaincre le Destin.
